about_the_game:
How many steps does it take to go from being depressed and seeking death to being a "workplace judge"? The story of Togawa Tsubasa, a young female programmer who has just graduated from college, can reveal the answer to you! This game is a strategy RPG game with the theme of "anti-work from 9 am to 9 pm, six days a week". The gameplay inherits from the classic "Magic Tower" series, combining elements such as pigeons and BD combinations. Please play with caution under the age of 35 to avoid dissing and hurting the boss!

Infiltrate the president's office, data center, yacht party, thank-you reception... workplace ugliness will be repaid doubly!

This work takes place in the magical city of Tokyo. The owner, Togawa Tsubasa, unexpectedly gains the ability to travel to the "Night Snack World". The "Night Snack World" overlaps with the real world, where human desires are purified and manifested in the form of monsters. Through this, Togawa Tsubasa can escape the shackles of reality, see the ugliness of the workplace wrapped in layers of darkness, obtain decisive evidence, and expose the truth to the world!

Originating from Japan, the "Magic Tower" series, which shines in China, has ushered in a new innovation!

The gameplay of this game originates from the "Magic Tower" series. It is easy to get started and has no operational barriers. Whether or not you can defeat the enemy depends entirely on the players' wisdom. However, there is no need to worry. The game will never freeze due to minor calculation errors. Through the pigeon gameplay, players can be fully revived every time, combined with various "slack off skills" to form imaginative BD and experience a completely different tower pushing fun!

While playing games, you can't also learn PMP, MBA, and master the workplace atmosphere!

A shiver! Boring! Pure venting and self-indulgence cannot solve the practical difficulties of working people. The development concept of this game is to help players better understand the workplace, grasp the workplace, and empathize with working people. The developers have collected a large number of workplace cases, PMP, MBA courses, and selected and adapted hundreds of workplace knowledge, allowing everyone to discover what is truly helpful to themselves while smiling knowingly!
